column2: Employer Share of Employer-Sponsored Private Health Insurance

column1: Employer Share of Employer- Sponsored Private Health Insurance
1 The employer shares of employer-sponsored private health insurance are calculated as employer contributions divided by total premiums (employer plus employee).
NOTES:  Numbers and percents may not add to totals because of rounding. Dollar amounts shown are in current dollars. Percent changes and percent distributions are calculated from unrounded data.
SOURCE:  Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, Office of the Actuary, National Health Statistics Group.
